name: tumblr.vim
description:
Syntax highlighting for Tumblr themes.

Screenshot: http://29.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_kz38v6harE1qz5urdo1_500.png
Source: http://github.com/inky/tumblr/tree/master/vim/
install_details:
Place tumblr.vim file in ~/.vim/syntax folder. To enable syntax highlighting for *.tumblr.html, add the following line to ~/.vim/filetype.vim:

au! BufRead,BufNewFile *.tumblr.html setfiletype tumblr
